title: WTT Frank Chance Red Portrait PSA
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTT Frank Chance Red Portrait PSA
posts.post_content:
1909 T206 Frank Chance Red Portrait - Piedmont 150 - PSA 1

Just recently picked this card up in the last LOTG auction and missed the fact that it has one of those wrinkle looking PSA backs. Being OCD, I can't look at it in my PSA HOF portrait display without seeing the difference from all of my other clear backed PSA T206 portraits! :D

I would love to trade this card for another portrait HOFer that I need and I can add cash based on the grade/value difference if necessary. Needs to be graded either PSA or SGC.

If you have anything available, please feel free to shoot me a PM.

Thanks for looking!

These are the portraits that I need:

Fred Clarke
Jimmy Collins
John Evers
Clark Griffith
Hughie Jennings
Rube Marquard
John McGraw
Joe Tinker
Vic Willis

Would also consider Sherry Magee
